entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as speaking and trying to read a parchment. He has an unusually shrewd expression on his face.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as responding to Ron's question and hiding the parchment from view.

entities.name: viktor
entities.description: Viktor is mentioned as the recipient of Hermione's novel.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having liked Cho for ages and being in a scene with her.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as the person Harry has liked for ages.

relationships.description: Ron tries to read the parchment.
Hermione is writing a novel for Viktor.
